title: Hollywood's children
creator_credit: Gene Feldman, Suzette Winter and Wombat Productions, Inc.
brief_description: Using live-action photography, film clips and stills, this film examines the role of children in films both as a projection of fantasies and as a reflection of social climates. Narrated by Roddy McDowall.
creator_credit_for_label: Gene Feldman, Suzette Winter and Wombat Productions, Inc.
